snippet.title: What is Blub Emporium? - Blub Emporium in under a minute
snippet.description:
Wishlist Blub Emporium on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1592530/Blub_Emporium/

In this video, I try my hardest to sum up Blub Emporium in less than a minute, It isn't easy; It only scratches the surface of what the game is.

Blub Emporium is a sandbox management game where you gather resources from the wild, process them into stock using machinery, and then sell them to colourful and cheery Blubs in your very own store that you design and decorate. The game has over a thousand items to collect, an array of minigames and activities, and of course, the millions of smiles of Blubs.
---------------------------------------------
Music:
Jordan Clark - Falling Aslumber (https://youtu.be/aAuU6m7aHk4)
---------------------------------------------
If you read this, comment something really random to confuse everyone! :)
